item.title: I'm More Convinced Than Ever That This Hunger Games Theory Is True After Sunrise On The Reaping
item.description: Sunrise on the Reaping revealed more hidden secrets involving the Capitol, Districts and the revolution, all of which could support a certain theory.

item.title: Who Is Joe Hildebrand In Warfare? The Real-Life Navy SEAL Behind Joseph Quinn's Character Explained
item.description: The real-life Navy SEAL behind Joseph Quinn's character in Warfare has been identified as Joe Hildebrand, who was part of the real Ramadi operation.

item.title: The Amateur's Pool Scene Freaked Me Out, But I Wish The Death Twist Was Used As A Surprise
item.description: Rami Malek's new spy movie, The Amateur, featured an insanely creative death scene, but the trailer had already given it away reducing its impact.
